actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority to award follow-on production contracts or transactions, procure supplies for experimental or test purposes, and acquire innovative commercial products and commercial services, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fast-Track Logistics for Acquiring Supplies in a Hurry Act of 2025

titles.title: Fast-Track Logistics for Acquiring Supplies in a Hurry Act of 2025

To amend the Public Health Service Act to authorize the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority to award follow-on production contracts or transactions, procure supplies for experimental or test purposes, and acquire innovative commercial products and commercial services, and for other purposes.
